subject: Writing and Writers
Athletics and Sports
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Isaacs was part of a group of young reporters known as the Chipmunks, who brought irreverence and daring to sports coverage beginning in the early 1960s.
snippet: Mr. Isaacs was part of a group of young reporters known as the Chipmunks, who brought irreverence and daring to sports coverage beginning in the early 1960s.
